reviews.text: Proud of my Jewish identity and want to broadcast it.

itâ€™s a very nice place, they have a goo service.

Amazing place great prices u have have to try there loaded fries u gotta try and Yossi is the best there is

Highly recommend the place, delicious food, well served, great service, good and happy people, especially Yossi, the guy who patiently accommodated us. Anyone in the area should stop here and check it out for themselves.
Great experience food and vibes were AMAZING!!!

First time I've had Schnitzel ğŸ˜ walked in and the girl at the counter could see i was at a loss of what to order.  She offered the order for me.. she got me a very delicious sandwich!  Very friendly staff, comfortable environment. Holy Schnitzel is definitely a must if you're in Crown Heights.

Delicious schnitzel sandwich and very good falafel too. Ordered on uber eats where they were running a BOGO promo on grilled chicken sandwiches, and their parsley chimichurri sauce is excellent on it!
AMAZING FOOD
Yossi is awesome
The food is just delicious, especially their fries with their garlic mayo absolutely amazing!!

I just ordered from Holy Schnitzel for an event I hosted with a large group, I couldnâ€™t be happier with the entire experience. From the moment I placed the order, the staff were incredibly helpful and responsive, they made sure every detail was covered and understood exactly what we needed for the occasion.

When the food arrived, it was packed so thoughtfully and organized in a way that made setup effortless. Each item was clearly labeled, neatly arranged, and still hot and fresh. The food itself was fantastic, everyone loved it.

Huge thank you to the Holy Schnitzel team for being so professional, kind, and efficient. You made hosting a large group easy and enjoyable. Highly recommend for any event, big or small!
Vibes are on top and the service is phenomenal. And donâ€™t sleep on the food. Best spot on Kingston without a doubt

Dimon was amazing 5 star service
And with a big smile on the face

Great kosher food. Very nice place to dine in, great kosher schnitzel, great desserts. Highly recommend to go and eat there.
Amazing ğŸ”¥

Amazing!!! Shout out to yossi

Best takeout food out there
I appreciate the fact that I came in here needing a big order and they did it for me on the spot. I didnâ€™t need to pre-order. They were patient.

Food is pretty good. Schnitzel could be better

Hands down the best schnitzel Iâ€™ve ever had in my life. Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside, and seasoned to perfection. On top of that, the service was amazing â€“ because we were Israeli soldiers visiting, the owner treated us like family and truly spoiled us with everything. A place with heart, flavor, and an experience Iâ€™ll never forget

Just checked out Holy Shnitzel in Crown Heights and wow!

The JalapeÃ±o Cheddar Crunchâ€¦ A flavor bomb in the best way. Crispy, spicy, cheesy (pareve cheese) exactly what you want when youâ€™re hungry and curious.

The Bacon Avocado Burger (yes, itâ€™s kosher â€œbacon,â€) was absolutely amazing, juicy, rich, and satisfying in every bite. And the Chicken Burger. Also a winner. Moist, flavorful, and made just right.

Now for some honesty. The Holy Grilled was just okay. The chicken was a bit on the dry side.

Holy Shnitzel delivers some serious flavor, especially if youâ€™re craving something bold and comforting. Definitely worth a visit and next time, I might even go holier and try something new.
Really good kosher food! Everything was really tasty delicious! Service was really great and very friendly. We really enjoyed eating there and definitely we will come back! Special thanks to Yosef
Phenomenal food and great vibes! Yossi and the team at Holy Schnitzel were extremely welcoming, professional, attentive and hospitable. They are truly passionate about their craft and it shows!

We were checked in and cared on by Yossi. Super sweet guy who have us great advice on the menu/options. Food was fresh and delicious, legit. portions are enormous. Service was brilliant.
10/10 experience
Looking forward to coming again.

Holy Schnitzel is my go-to spot when I'm craving something that's guaranteed to be delicious and filling. The beauty of this place is the sheer amount of customization you can do. While their classic Holy Toasty is a must-try, the real adventure is in building your own perfect sandwich or platter.

This restaurant is fantastic! The service is excellent, and the staff is always friendly and welcoming. The food is fresh, delicious, and includes great healthy options. I especially loved the grilled chicken with grilled vegetablesâ€”it was cooked perfectly and full of flavor. Highly recommend!
I came with a party of 12 and Dimall set up a beautiful table outside for us. The food was amazing, especially the truffle bacon fries. We also enjoyed the (free) cookies ğŸª .
Very delicious, clean food, friendly staff, and great atmosphere. Everything always comes fresh and not greasy. This time we got soup. So good hits the spot to warm and fill you up.
Ran into the owner he was an amazing guy very polite offered us to try some food, which was amazing. We are from out of town and our minds are blown away. Definitely try this place.

Amazing service and delicious food!!!

The staff were very hospitable and helpful with the menu. The service was quickâ€”I waited less than 10 minutes for my order. Everything was incredibly tasty, fresh, and satisfying. Iâ€™ll definitely be coming back and highly recommend this place for a quick lunch break or a relaxed dinner with family.

I've dined at restaurants all over the world, so when I say this spot stands out, I truly mean it. Without a doubt, it's one of the best in the neighborhood. The quality of the food is never compromised ! Every dish feels intentional and well-crafted. The space itself? A total vibe.
But what really sets this place apart is the service. The owner, Yossi, is hands down one of the kindest, most genuine people Iâ€™ve met in the hospitality world. The staff follow that energyâ€¦  warm, attentive, and consistently on point. Honestly, even if the food wasnâ€™t amazing (spoiler: it is), Iâ€™d still come back just for the experience. Itâ€™s that good.
If you havenâ€™t been yet, trust me â€” go. And if you have, tell me your go-to order... I need ideas for my next visit.
Huge thanks to Yossi and the entire team for making every visit feel special. 10/10.

Super chill dude at the counter, was easy to order and quick to get our food.
Food was solid, and the kids meals come with free toys!

The holy schnitzel is the best place to eat in Crown Heights. The owner is kind and pleasant, everything is clean and delicious. The food came out hot and fast I had a really pleasant experience, I will go back to eat there again, highly recommended.

Everything about this place was wonderful! We got burgers and fries, the atmosphere was so exciting and the music was amazing. The service was fast, warm, and the whole vibe of the place was inviting and cool. 10/10 would recommend!

From the moment you walk in you feel special, Yoshii greeted me and introduced me to a menu full of delicious options. Got myself a buffalo chicken wrap on a baguette, absolute quality, one of the best I ever had.

Fast forward I brought my wife for her birthday and once again Yoshii guided us through the impeccable menu options.

We are very happy and thankful for the experience, we highly recommend anyone to come for lunch or dinner hours, canâ€™t wait to be back!

If youâ€™re looking for the ultimate schnitzel experience, Holy Schnitzel is the place to go. Their schnitzel sandwich is absolutely unbeatable â€” perfectly crispy on the outside, tender and juicy on the inside, and packed with incredible flavor. The fresh roll and toppings bring it all together, making every bite something you look forward to.

On top of that, their prices are shockingly affordable for the quality and size of the portions you get. Itâ€™s rare to find food this good at prices that make you feel like youâ€™re getting way more than your moneyâ€™s worth.

Between the taste, the portions, and the unbeatable value, Holy Schnitzel has it all. Easily the best schnitzel sandwich around â€” once you try it, youâ€™ll keep coming back.

Yo this place is great, food is delish, service is great, atmosphere is amazing!

The server Shmuel Green took the time to help me use the computer I could not figure out on my own and then even went to the back and made sure everything came out exceptional for me
The best holy by far. The service is great. The food was incredible. Definitely recommend.

Wow, wow, Holy Schnitzel! ğŸ˜
Best schnitzel spotâ€”these guys got it right!
Great service, great flavor, and perfect crunch.

Their sauces are top-notch, and the bread is excellent. We tried the Southern schnitzel in a baguette-Yum! the schnitzel in a wrap-ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹, and a side of fries, ğŸ¤Œwhich was a generous portion. They also have an option to get three kinds of fries(as one order), which Iâ€™ll probably try next time. The single order of fries was already a big serving and super tasty, with a legendary crunch.

I definitely recommend this place!
Their menu is hugeâ€”theyâ€™ve got options for days! ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹
Great food. Get the schnitzel platter. Itâ€™s amazingly fresh. The kiddos also like the kid boxes with toys.

Holy Schnitzel has gone above and beyond to cater for our dinner events for our nonprofit organization.

Their service was incredible. Took the time to go over the menu and care for the specific needs of our group.

They were very diligent in the presentation and their food was really delicious!

Thank you for your incredible service!

Awesome vibes really nice people super duper kind hearted people the best customer service I will 100% come back and the food is gasssssssssss itâ€™s so amazing itâ€™s also not overpriced and itâ€™s always chill here all the staff are super kind and itâ€™s very clean so it is worth what ever you have to do to come here recommend

We came in starving. After a long day of work and not only did the food taste miraculous and amazing but the service and the smiles that we received were just splendid. Thanks a bunch, holy guys, you really made our holy day so much better. See you next time, brother!

Honestly, I love Holy Schnitzel. Their schnitzel is always super crispy and tasty, and everything feels really fresh. The people who work there are so nice and the whole place just feels welcoming. Itâ€™s become my go-to spot whenever Iâ€™m craving something good and kosher.

Holy Schnitzel is hands-down the best kosher meat restaurant around! Every time I eat here, I leave completely satisfied and already planning my next visit. The food is consistently fresh, flavorful, and generously portioned. Their schnitzel is perfectly crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside, and packed with flavorâ€”absolutely lives up to the name!

The menu has something for everyone, from loaded sandwiches and burgers to creative salads and wraps. You can tell they put care into every dish. The staff is friendly and welcoming, and the service is fast even during busy hours. Whether you're dining in or grabbing takeout, itâ€™s always a great experience.

If you're looking for high-quality kosher meat in a clean, modern, and upbeat environmentâ€”this is the spot. Holy Schnitzel gets it right every time. Highly recommend!

Came with my kids and had a wonderful meal. Great food, great vibes, quality service, and creative menu. A+ would highly recommend. â¤ï¸

pro tip: splurge on the corn flake and take a chance on the chimichurri!

Wonderful food with a wonderful atmosphere. Staff is incredibly kind and generous.
I got the Schnitzel platter and it came with a good sized side of fries
Great kosher food! Kids loved the Kids meals!

I had such a great experience dining here. The food was absolutely delicious â€“ fresh, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. The schnitzel was crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, and the portions were generous. The staff was friendly, attentive, and made us feel very welcome. The atmosphere is casual and upbeat, perfect for both a quick lunch or a relaxed dinner. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great kosher food with a modern twist!

I had the chance to meet the owner of the restaurant, he has been exceptional! The food was fresh and delicious. The staff was very accommodating! I would definitely return here and I recommend this restaurant!

Amazing new branch of holy shnitzel. What matters most with schnitzels is the shnitzel :)  and itâ€™s amazing! Relatively quick, friendly service and nice ambience. Nothing fancy but simply good food.

After ordering my holy toastie I was met with exceptional service. The cashier Shmuel was outstanding and exceeded expectations.. not only was my family met with respect and warmth but the food came very quickly.. this was by far my best experience at holy schnitzel! Thank you to the cashier, he and all the staff!! Definitely recommend :)

The owner is amazing, he is kind and attentive to all the customers always helping. The food is delicious and always cooked to your preference when asked for a menu change.
The place is always clean and they pay attention to making sure that it feels welcoming.

Definitely a great place to eat on kingston ave

Holy schnitzel is by far the best food I have tasted in NYC!!! Hands down delicious I highly recommend you come check them out. The staff is super polite & the service was fast. 2 thumbs upğŸ’¯â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
Such a great experience, friendly staff, super quick service and delicious food.

Recently ordered from Holy Schnitzel in Crown Heights for a corporate event and the experience was absolutely amazing! The food was delicious, fresh, and a hit with everyone. Highly recommend asking for Yossiâ€”he handled everything with professionalism and made sure it was all done in a timely and smooth way. 10/10 service and experience. Will definitely be ordering again!

Place is incredible. Ownership and service top notch. Not only was my sandwich unreal the owner Yossi was also kind enough to give me free chicken tenders to try and a chocolate chip cookie which were both also out of this world. Will continue to come back!

I decided to come on a Saturday night with a group of friends & even though it was very busy, the staff were super accommodating and made sure we were taken care of! Excellent service & the food was definitely worth the wait!!
The schnitzel was like chewing gum. I ordered challah and they brought me a baguette and the eggplant was unripe and very hard. Not recommended.
